title: Mother and 2 sons wounded in Detroit triple shooting
content:
Police are at the scene of a reported triple shooting on Detroit's west side.
A mother and her two sons were wounded after men in three vehicles opened fire at Cathedral and Mansfield, according to police.
The woman in her 40s and her two sons, in their 20s are in stable condition at a nearby hospital.
Police believe the shooting may be connected to a previous altercation from one day earlier.
Mother and 2 sons wounded in Detroit triple shooting
The shooting happened at about 6:40 p.m. when the three victims were on their porch.
Stay with FOX 2 for more information as it becomes available.
